summary: A set of sixteen different werewolf eye colors.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod - a set of werewolf eyes to replace the default yellow. Always open to suggestions; if there\'s a color you want, just ask! (And check out the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=442]Werewolf Skins mod[/url] by Spacerogue, it\'s very good. I\'m afraid I can\'t texture skins, but he does an excellent job.)* **

If you want to use these eyes in anything, there\'s no need to ask me - I\'d be happy to see these get used. Just please link back here or give credit.

This is my first time playing with DDS files, so if you have any advice, please let me know.

This mod is wholly compatible with werewolf skin retextures; however, you have to rewrite the eyes included in those skins with the eyes from the eye pack, or specifically tell the computer not to have the skin\'s eyes overwrite the eye pack eyes (depending on what you had installed first). I can\'t forsee any compatibility problems with anything, barring a complete overhaul of the werewolf [i]mesh[/i]. Even then, possibly not.

*I\'d advise mixing and matching some of the eyes and coats. Some of the darker eyes like blue-violet look much better on a lighter or white werewolf, and the blue eyes on the grey werewolf is my personal favorite.

**The vanilla highlight over the eyes tends to cover the werewolf\'s pupil entirely. If you want to fix this, Spacerogue has a file included that changes the size of the highlight so the werewolf\'s eye is properly visible.

Finally; if you\'re interested in working on - or even just adding your two cents to - a new werewolf experience entirely, please pay this thread a visit; http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/506131-wip-call-of-hircine-bloodmoon-rising/
author: Diana
